articles.author: Brandon Tensley
articles.title: What Oklahoma's governor and others get wrong about tribal sovereignty
articles.description: Republican Gov. Kevin Stitt's comment about a landmark US Supreme Court case is "irresponsible" and "part of a larger push to eradicate tribal sovereignty in this country," Crystal Echo Hawk told CNN.
articles.content:
A version of this story appeared in CNNs Race Deconstructed newsletter. To get it in your inbox every week, sign up for free here.

articles.author: Amanda Davies, CNN
articles.title: Serena Williams and Lewis Hamilton join consortium to buy Chelsea
articles.description: Twenty-three-time grand slam champion Serena Williams and seven-time Formula One world champion Lewis Hamilton have joined Martin Broughton's bid to buy Premier League club Chelsea, a source close to the bid told CNN Sport on Thursday.

articles.title: Johnny Depp cross-examined in defamation case against Amber Heard
articles.description: Johnny Depp is testifying for a third day in a Fairfax, Virginia court in his defamation case against his ex-wife Amber Heard.
articles.content:
(CNN)Johnny Depp is testifying for a third day in a Fairfax, Virginia court in his defamation case against his ex-wife Amber Heard.
